summary: BORPA - Borpa is a BetterTTV extension custom Twitch emote based on a variation of Pepe the Frog. Named and popularized by users on Twitch streamer MOONMOON's Discord, the emote gained viral popularity in early May 2021. $BORPA is coming to the Ethereum blockchain with a stealth launch of the $BORPA token. no dev wallet, no team wallet, no shitscam.
